comment: Axiom of Choice (first form) of [Enderton] p. 49 corresponds to our Axiom of Choice (in the form of ~ ac3 ). The proof does not make use of AC, but the Axiom of Regularity is used (by applying ~ dfac2b ). (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 16-Jun-2022.)
